page.title: 16HOBBIES AND INTERESTS
page.content: Most hobbies and interests of children in this area take place at the weekend.Reading is one of the most popular hobbies, but living in the country means travelling to a library. Most people travel to Malvern which is about five miles away, though a few children wait for the mobile library ro come to the village.Swimming is another hobby which involves travelling.Most people go to Lowerwick in Worcester, which is about 8 miles away. Two hobbies which are also popular and easily done by children living in the country are bird watching and horse riding.Alot of children collect things,such as postcards,stamps and stickers,badges, rubbers and china figures. Many interests are difficult to follow because we don't live in towns.
